text:
Technical Lead for impact company- Chicago, IL

SHIFT is a web and mobile fundraising platform that sends cash directly to women living in extreme poverty around the world and tracks impact overtime. We are looking for a top notch impact driven Technical Lead to drive our technology and team forward. IF you are a full-stack developer with experience in RoR, payments, and voice APIs reach out to our Founder Tricia Martinez today tricia@shiftwomen.com. To impact!
